reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MICB 302, BIOT 380. (If MICB 302 is used as the prerequisite for MICB 402, students are required to take one of the following as a corequisite: BIOL 234, BIOL 335, MICB 325.)
Questions about registration should be directed to Dr. Kion at tkion@mail.ubc.ca.
This course is credit excluded with MEDG 410.
description: Molecular basis of lymphocyte development, activation and adhesion; immunogenetics and the major histocompatibility complex. Consult the credit exclusion list within the Faculty of Science section of the calendar.
